content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Before you get down to your first domain password reset request, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"carefully\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" study Rules of domain password reset article at KB: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://entportalpct.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Rules%20for%20domain%20password%20generation.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". It is very important to process such requests accurately as this is related to security issues.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information on how to reset domain password is available here:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"1.42857\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://entportalpct.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Domain%20(NT)%20Password%20regeneration.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
